archiefmat.scope: Register of correspondence received from authorities in the Netherlands (Ministry of Colonies),from authorities and private individuals in the Suriname and occasionally from authorities in the neighboring colonies. Short contents and sender are listed together with the date and number of the document and the date and number of registration. The subjects of the letters concern any conceivable subject that the colonial administration had to attend to.
archiefmat.notes:
Period: 1856, June-September; 1857-1858; 1872-1874. The complete series up to 1952 consists of  20 volumes.

The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
